answers.answer: I had preeclampsia with my first child during the third trimester and after birth. I had to get surgery on my ankles to drain out the fluid. I just enetered my third trimester too my due date is july 28 and we are on the same boat. I seem to be and feel normal now but we just have to wait and see. I hope all goes well for you.

question: Hi there hope all well with you and with your babies mommies<3Im 26 weeks just entered to third trimester and im really concern because in my previous pregnancy i had preeclempsia ended up with emergency c section at 36+5.Im scare this time even will start earlier, till now everything was okay but im concern from now on
title: Preeclampsia
